about_the_game:
"Beast and Princess" is a tower defense game where you battle it out by stringing together combos!

Call upon plushie soldiers to sweep your enemies aside, and unleash ultimate moves to power through any pinch!

  • Combos

By stringing together ultimate moves, your attack power builds up, incentivizing well-timed combos!

  • Skills

Every skill on its own is very powerful.

Buff your favorite units and enter combat with your own unique super team!

  • Story

One day, two princess twins found themselves suddenly trapped inside a game.

The way out? Beat the game.

In their path stand great foes, alongside a mysterious in-game voice.

Why did the twin princesses get trapped here?

Whoever's behind the mysterious voice, what are they plotting?

And the ultimate question - do you have what it takes to reach the end of this thrilling story!

short_description: A tower defense game where you combo ultimate moves to take down enemies! Have fun unleashing those moves while learning more about the twin princesses' story. Why did the twins get trapped in a game? What's the goal of the game master? And do you have what it takes to see it all to the end?
